songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Uncle Murda]
Yeah
BrookIyn

[Chorus: Tory Lanez & Uncle Murda]
Them bitches go for 62 around this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
Don't fuck around and move 'round this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa)
You must not know how we move 'round this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
Just play it cool 'round this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa)

[Post-Chorus: Tory Lanez & Uncle Murda]
I sell that dope where I want to (Skrrt)
I hit the poppie and fuck her (Yeah, yeah)
I sell that dope where I want to (Skrrt)
I hit the poppie and fuck her (Yeah, yeah)

[Verse 1: Uncle Murda]
The Mexicans got it straight around this motherfucker (Free Chapo)
Work coming in from LA, 'round this motherfucker (Yeah)
Break it down, we don't sell weight 'round this motherfucker (Oh, we don't do that, nah)
We wan't every dollar being made around this motherfucker (I do it better so we want in)
We sell that dope in the building, in front of their neighbors and children
I got to re-up mañana, my plug is like Tony Montana
I know the Fed's got us on camera, they want to throw us in the slammer
They want to run up on mi casa, they thirsty go get 'em some agua (Whoa, whoa, whoa)

[Refrain: Uncle Murda]
Three cellphones hotline blingin', trappin' all night (Trappin' all night)
Got lawyer money, no legal aid, we be alright (Oh, we got money)
What's the bail? I bail out, we all bail out (We gone)
The plug ain't worried, 10 more bricks, just got bailed out

[Chorus: Tory Lanez & Uncle Murda]
Bitches go for 62 around this motherfucker (Goddamn)
Don't fuck around and move 'round this motherfucker (Whoa)
You must not know how we move 'round this motherfucker (Goddamn)
Just play it cool 'round this motherfucker (Whoa)

[Post-Chorus: Tory Lanez & Uncle Murda]
I sell that dope where I want to (Skrrt)
I hit the poppie and fuck her (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
I sell that dope where I want to (Skrrt)
I hit the poppie and fuck her (Whoa, whoa, whoa)

[Bridge: Uncle Murda]
Niggas on the block all day around this muh'fucker (Oh we out here)
Niggas sellin' dope not ye, around this muh'fucker (Got it, got it, got it)
Shift sounded like an AK around this muh'fucker (Nigga bang bang, nigga die)
Bang, bang we'll let it spray around this muh'fucker  (Woo)

[Verse 2: Uncle Murda]
Look how that dope got 'em leaning (Woo)
They know it's a 10, now they feigning (Woo)
They get sick without it, they need it (Woo)
I cut it with, no, that's a secret (Shh)
Look how the plug got me poppin' (Whoa)
I want a Rollie, I can cop it (Got it)
I can take 10 bitches shoppin' (Bitch bad)
You know how these bitches love shoppin' (Haha)

[Refrain: Uncle Murda]
Three cellphones hotline blingin', trappin' all night (Trappin' all night)
Got lawyer money, no legal aid, we be alright (We be alright)
What's the bail? I bail out, we all bail out (We all bail out)
The plug ain't worried, 10 more bricks, just got bailed out

[Chorus: Tory Lanez & Uncle Murda]
Bitches go for 62 around this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
Don't fuck around and move 'round this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa)
You must not know how we move 'round this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
Just play it cool 'round this motherfucker (Whoa, whoa)

[Post-Chorus: Tory Lanez & Uncle Murda]
I sell that dope where I want to (Skrrt)
I hit the poppie and fuck her (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
I sell that dope where I want to (Skrrt)
I hit the poppie and fuck her (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
